protein.specific_function: Carnitine acetylase is specific for short chain fatty acids. Carnitine acetylase seems to affect the flux through the pyruvate dehydrogenase complex. It may be involved as well in the transport of acetyl-CoA into mitochondria.

go_class.description: transferase activity, transferring acyl groups other than amino-acyl groups
fatty acid beta-oxidation using acyl-CoA oxidase
